document.full_text: with his approval ratings low and aides telling him things he did not want to hear, then-illinois governor rod blagojevich was angry in late 2008, according to testimony at his corruption trial on wednesday.
document.title: blagojevich tapes played at length in court for jury
lines_and_colors: with his approval ratings low and aides telling him things he did not want to hear, then-illinois governor rod blagojevich was angry in late 2008, according to testimony at his corruption trial on wednesday.
